main event: A pilot observed an unidentified flying object while flying an F-47 aircraft near Louisville, Kentucky on September 20, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright, orange-red light traveling at an estimated speed of 800-1000 mph., The object had an erratic course and was similar in appearance to a sphere previously seen by the pilot., The sighting lasted approximately 10 to 15 seconds., The object appeared to emit a pulsating glow, and multiple objects were seen flying parallel to each other., After the sighting, ground control confirmed no aircraft in the vicinity.
sighted object: bright, orange-red light resembling a sphere
